update bass_query_main
DS_ID = #{dsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUERY_NAME = #{queryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUERY_RS = #{queryRs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where QUERY_ID = #{queryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
